revised_title: The Detonating Bolide of November 20th, 1887: An Investigation
tldr: The author investigates a reported earthquake shock that occurred on November 20th, 1887, and suggests that it was more likely caused by an explosive bolide rather than an earthquake. The phenomenon was heard or felt over an area of over 2000 square miles, and the author collects and examines records from various locations to support this conclusion.
